metadata.title: CVE-2016-7953 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - low
metadata.description:
Buffer underflow in X.org libXvMC before 1.0.10 allows remote X servers tohave unspecified impact via an empty string.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7953` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxvmc1 - 2:1.0.10-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libxvmc package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:1.0.10-1').
